mdRecord.dcterms:description: Garden sculpture by John Storrs atop spiral staircase, belvedere

Residence originally designed 1912-13 by Henry Corwith Dangler. Renovated and expanded 1921-22 by David Adler. Further additions 1928-29 by Adler. -- David Adler, architect : the elements of style, Art Institute of Chicago, 2002. [work]
